name: Chiroform Head Rest Paper
descr:
NEW improved version.

Chiroform paper rolls in white for use on Hilo/Vertilift tables, reeled nice and elegant on a carton.The paper rolls is made of strong paper with a smooth, glossy surface. It is designed especially for its use.

The Chiroform paper rolls is produced from pure bleached pulp and consists entirely of primary fibers. These fibers are from slow growing Scandinavian forest, which gives the paper its inherent strength.

Weight 22-40 gram and 119 meter lenght per roll.

Sold in boxes with 10 rolls.

Specifications: 215x80x35 mm.
